Login.LoginHeadtxt: Welcome! Unlock Your Selling Potential on Spurtcommerce Seller Panel
Login.LoginDetail1: Easily list, update, and manage your products from one centralized dashboard.
Login.LoginDetail2: Track real-time sales performance and earnings effortlessly.
Login.LoginDetail3: Access transparent payment details and manage settlements seamlessly.
Login.LoginDetail4: Gain insights with detailed reports to optimize your selling strategy.
Login.LoginDetail5: Stay organized with intuitive tools for product listings and sales management.

Dashboard.TopSellingDescription: No data available yet. Start tracking your top-selling products to see your best performers!
Dashboard.ReceiveOrdersDescription: No orders have been received. Once you start receiving orders, they will appear here.
Dashboard.RecentOrderDescription: There are currently no recent orders. Keep an eye here for updates on the latest orders you receive.
Dashboard.RecentSalesDescription: No recent sales data to display. As you make sales, this section will show your most recent transactions.
Dashboard.WelcomeBacktoYourSellerAccount: Unlock full access to your Seller Dashboard! Complete your profile, submit documentation for verification, get verified as a legitimate Seller on our Platform, and start listing and selling your products to a wider audience today.
Dashboard.Hey: Hey (Name), You're almost there! Finish updating your profile, submit your documents for verification, and get verified to access all features of your Seller Dashboard. Need assistance? Contact support
Dashboard.Note: Note: Completing the 'My Shop' section does not impact access to the dashboard. This section allows you to customize your store's appearance at your own pace. Access to your panel begins after completing 'My Profile' and getting verified by submitting documentation under ‘My KYC Details’.
Dashboard.Alert: Alert: Your documentation has been rejected. Under 'My KYC Details' in your profile, navigate to 'Upload Documents' to view the rejected document(s) and reasons provided. You can reupload the document or contact support at support@spurtcommerce.com for assistance to resolve this issue and resubmit for verification. Your success is our priority!

content.Postanswerstothequestionhere: Post answers to the question here. Provide helpful and accurate information to assist the person who asked the question. One of the answers can be set as the default visible answer for users. Additional answers can be viewed by clicking to expand them.
content.QuestiondetailsAddContent: Enter your question about the product. This will be visible to other users and the product team, who can provide answers or additional information.
content.FailedDashbalances: Your application has been rejected. This decision may be due to factors beyond the documentation, such as alignment with our marketplace criteria. Please review the potential reasons for rejection or contact support for further clarification.
content.FailedDash: Alert: Your  application has been rejected. Under 'My KYC Details' in your profile, navigate to 'Upload Documents' to view the rejected document(s) and reasons provided. You can reupload the document or contact support at
content.welcomeMessage: You're almost there! Finish updating your profile, submit your documents for verification, and get verified to access all features of your Seller Dashboard. Need assistance? Contact
content.orderfaild: Alert! Most of your orders are pending for shipment and delivery. Please prioritize and expedite their processing to meet customer expectations promptly.
content.orderSuccess: Great! All your orders have been shipped. You can now track and manage their delivery status, ensuring your customers receive their items promptly.
content.backorderContent: Manage orders awaiting stock availability to fulfil customer demands effectively. Stay proactive by updating customers on expected delivery times, ensuring transparency and satisfaction.
content.failOrderedcontent: Review orders that were unsuccessful due to failed transactions and assist in resolving issues promptly to ensure seamless transactions and retain customer trust.
content.QuotationRequests: Access and respond to quotation requests from customers promptly, ensuring you fulfil their requirements with competitive pricing and detailed proposals. By providing timely responses, you can secure valuable business opportunities.
content.StockUpdate: Monitor and update your inventory levels regularly to ensure accurate product availability. By maintaining optimal stock levels, you can meet customer demands promptly and minimize delays in fulfilment.
content.VariantStockUpdate: Manage specific variants of products in your inventory meticulously to ensure precise stock levels for each product variation. This allows you to offer diverse options to customers without any inconvenience.
content.orderstatus: Sellers can select from a dropdown of available statuses to update the order status, informing the customer about its progress and current status.
content.AvailableCustomers: View a list of customers who can be assigned to this group. Select customers by clicking on the ‘+’ sign next to their names.
content.SelectedCustomers: Customers selected for this group will appear here. Selected customers will be assigned to this group.
content.RateTopContent: Your product may have received positive reviews ranging from 3 to 5 stars, as well as critical feedback with ratings from 1 to 2 stars. While you have the option to choose whether to display these reviews on your product detail page, it is recommended that you show reviews to your customers.  This helps them make informed decisions about your products.
content.QAcontent: By adding questions and answers to the product detail page, you can provide detailed information about your products, to your customers. Also, your customers can ask specific questions on the product detail page, and you can offer informative answers. This interaction is crucial for helping potential buyers make well-informed decisions about your products.
content.productListContent: Alert! Some of your products have not been approved yet. Review the reasons for rejection, make necessary adjustments, and resubmit for approval to start showcasing your offerings to potential customers.
content.productListcontentSuccess: Congratulations! All your products have been approved and listed. Provide detailed specifications, images, and comprehensive information to give customers maximum clarity and attract their interest.
content.ProductAssignPrice: Set exclusive pricing for specific customers or customer groups to tailor your offerings effectively. Provide unique pricing options that cater to different segments, enhancing customer satisfaction and driving sales.
content.commonProductCOntent: List your products efficiently by selecting from the available catalog. Simply specify your available inventory, set your selling price, and manage stock levels effortlessly. This streamlined process ensures accurate product listings and avoids duplication.
content.RelatedProdcut: Select items from your available catalog to feature as related products, offering customers additional choices that complement their purchase.
content.productVariant: Enhance your product offerings with customizable variants and options, ensuring a comprehensive selection that meets varied customer preferences and needs. Providing a diverse range of variants not only broadens your product range but also enriches the choices available to your customers, enhancing their shopping experience.
content.BulkProductImport: Streamline your product management with bulk product imports. Download our CSV or Excel template, fill in product details such as title, description, pricing, etc. Effortlessly upload them to your catalog, save time and ensure accuracy in managing large volumes of products.
content.DataExport: Easily export crucial business data such as orders, failed orders, customer details, and product information with our intuitive data export feature. Seamlessly download comprehensive reports in CSV or Excel format to analyze trends, track performance, and make informed business decisions.
content.BulkProductMapping: Efficiently map multiple product listings to various fields in bulk to streamline your product management process.
content.Customer: Effortlessly manage your Customers with our CRM and customer list page. Access detailed insights including customer names, email addresses, mobile numbers, group affiliations, addresses, purchase history. this information, you may plan on strategies to personalize interactions, enhance engagement, and drive customer loyalty effectively.
content.Couponfail: Since you have more expired coupons, revitalize your sales strategy by reactivating them! Update and reuse expired offers to attract customers and drive sales. Alternatively, create new coupons to refresh your promotions and engage your audience.
content.Couponsuccess: Well done on managing your coupons effectively! Your active promotions are driving sales and engaging customers. Keep up the good work by continuing to create and manage your offers strategically.
content.supplierList: Empower your business with our Supplier  feature! Easily manage your trusted suppliers and streamline your sourcing process. By maintaining detailed supplier profiles and contact information, you can quickly refer your customers to reliable partners, ensuring seamless collaborations and satisfied clients.
content.ContactList: Organize and optimize your business contacts with our Contact  tool. Effectively manage all your interactions, whether with suppliers or customers. Keep comprehensive records and foster strong relationships to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. Streamline communication and referrals, ensuring your business runs smoothly and grows consistently.
content.SettlementsList: View detailed settlements for your orders with ease on our Settlements page. Track whether payments from admin for your orders have been settled or are pending settlement, ensuring transparency and clarity in your financial transactions.
content.ArchivedPayments: Here, you can view the list of archived payments. Easily track and manage past eCommerce transactions for accurate record-keeping.
content.Earnings: Track your earnings from each product listed with us. Gain insights into your product performance and optimize your sales strategy based on real-time earnings data.
content.Reports: Generate comprehensive reports categorized by product, category, or combinations thereof. Analyze data over specific date ranges or overall performance to gain actionable insights into your sales and performance metrics.
content.backOrdersFaild: Following Orders cannot be marked for fulfillment due to shortage of Inventory. Kindly replenish the adequate stock and retry the fulfillment !!

common.titleSpecification: Following custom attributes maked up this specification.
common.specification: Clearly list detailed information and custom attributes of your product, such as dimensions, materials, features, and other relevant specifications. This helps potential buyers make informed purchasing decisions and ensures transparency about what they are purchasing.
common.AvailableGroupNote: List of all customers or customer groups who are eligible to be assigned to this price group. Use the search function to find specific customers quickly.
common.SelectedGroupNote: List of customers or customer groups currently assigned to this price group. These are the ones who will receive the specified pricing. Use the search function to find and manage selections easily.
common.CustomerMapNote: Specify which customer groups or customers will see this pricing configuration. Only the selected customer groups  or selected customers will be eligible for the defined price.
common.QuantityNote: Define the minimum and maximum quantities for which this pricing configuration applies. Set quantity ranges to offer tiered pricing.
common.PriceNote: Enter The price to be applied for the specified quantity and customer group.The price that will be visible to customers based on the configuration.
common.StartDateNote: Set the date from which this pricing configuration will become active. The pricing will not be applied before this date.
common.EndDateNote: Set the date until which this pricing configuration will be valid. The pricing will no longer apply after this date.
common.PriceGroupNote: Select a price group to apply specific pricing rules. This helps in managing different pricing strategies for various customer segments.
common.NoAttributeData: Displays the assigned attributes in a structured format. Review and manage the attributes here to ensure they are accurately applied to the product.
common.AssignAttribute: Select and assign relevant attributes to the product, such as size, color, or material. This helps categorize and filter the product effectively on the platform.
common.ProductSpecificationDescription: Clearly list detailed information and custom attributes of your product, such as dimensions, materials, features, and other relevant specifications. This helps potential buyers make informed purchasing decisions and ensures transparency about what they are purchasing.
common.ProductLocalNote: Displays localization settings for products, including translations and region-specific details. Manage how your products are presented in different regions.
common.NoRelatedProduct: No related products available. Add related products to link similar items and increase sales.
common.AvailableRelatedProduct: Manage and assign related products to enhance cross-selling opportunities. Select products that are similar or complementary.
common.CreateAndConfigure: Create and configure new pricing rules for your products by specifying price ranges, discounts, or special offers.
common.NoPricingConfigurationsNote: Add new price settings to manage your product pricing effectively.
common.PriceConfigurationsNote: Define various pricing rules and configurations for your products, such as default pricing, discount and special pricing.
common.AssignAttributeDescription: Add or modify product specifications and assign attributes like size, color, or material to your product.
common.SEODescription: Set up SEO-friendly attributes for your product, including meta title, meta description, and keywords to improve visibility in search engines.
common.ProductDetailsContent: Enter or update essential product information such as name, description, map product categories, update images.
common.BulkUpdateDescription: Allows you to update the status of multiple orders at once. Select the orders you wish to update, choose the new status from the dropdown menu, and apply the changes.
common.ArchiveDescription: Displays the columns for archived orders including details like order ID, date, customer, and status. Use this table to review past orders that have been archived.
common.ArchiveOrdersDescription: There are no archived orders at the moment. Once you start archiving orders, they will appear here for easy access and historical reference.
common.NoCatogoriesAvailabe: No categories have been assigned to you yet. Once the Admin assigns categories for selling, they will be displayed here for you to choose from.
common.NoSupplierData: No suppliers have been added yet. Once suppliers are added, you will be able to update their details here.
common.NoContactsData: Add a new contact for your suppliers. Include details like name, email, and phone number to maintain effective communication.
common.NoDocumentsAdded: Upload and manage important documents related to your suppliers, such as contracts, certificates, or compliance paperwork.
common.NoAddLinks: Include relevant links for your suppliers, such as their website or online profiles, for easy access to additional information.
common.NoCommentsAdd: Add and view comments or notes about your suppliers. This helps keep track of important details or communications.
common.ProductNameLabel: Enter The name of your product. Provide an attractive, descriptive and SEO-friendly title for your product. It should accurately reflect the product's key features and benefits.
common.SKUDescription: A unique Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) number for your product. Start with a prefix followed by a number. When variants are added, the system will automatically generate unique numbers following the same prefix.
common.InventoryDescription: Enter The quantity of this product currently available in your stock. This helps manage product availability and ensures accurate stock levels for efficient order fulfilment.
common.ProductDescriptionLabe: Provide a detailed description of your product, highlighting its unique features, benefits, and specifications. This helps potential buyers make informed purchasing decisions and enhances your product's appeal.
common.P&V-Description: Upload high-quality photos and videos of your product. Visual content helps customers make informed purchasing decisions.
common.ImageRequired: Upload high-resolution photos and videos to effectively showcase your product's unique features and intricate details. Compelling visual content is essential for capturing the attention of potential buyers and driving increased sales.
common.PriceSetupDescription: Configure the pricing details for your product. Set the default selling price, apply taxes, and manage special and discount prices to attract customers and optimize sales strategies.
common.DefaultPriceDescription: Set the standard selling price for your product. This is the price that will be displayed to visitors on the site when no special or discount price is applied.
common.ProductCostDescription: Enter The base cost of manufacturing or acquiring the product.
common.TaxDescription: Specify any applicable taxes on the product. You can input the tax value either as a fixed amount or a percentage.
common.ValueLabel: Input the tax amount as a fixed value.
common.PercentageLabel: Input the tax amount as a percentage of the product price.
common.ToatalCostLabel: Total price including product cost and taxes.
common.DiscountPriceLabel: The Discount Price allows sellers to offer products at a reduced rate compared to the Default Price, attracting customers with enticing deals. When a Discount Price is set, it takes precedence over the Default Price and replaces it.
common.SpecialPriceLabel: The Special Price feature allows you to set a temporary lower price for specific products, prioritizing it over the Discount Price when both are active. It displays prominently alongside the Default Price, which is struck out, encouraging quick purchases during promotions or seasonal campaigns.
common.No Data Available For The Filtered Crite: No Data Available For The Filtered Criteria
common.AddTrackingURLContent: Enter ther URl for the shipment tracking page to allow customers to view detailed tracking information for their orders.
common.AddTrackingIDContent: Enter or update the shipment tracking ID here to provide the latest tracking information for your order.
common.NoDataAvailablefortheFilteredCriteria: No Data Available for the Filtered Criteria
common.No of times the user can use this discou: No of times the user can use this discount
common.Specify the number of cart Items the cou: Specify the number of cart Items the coupon code can be applied
common.Enter your Registered email ID below We: Enter your Registered email ID below. We will sent the link to
common.Must be at least 8 characters long: Must be at least 8 characters long
common.Password must contain at least one lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase and one uppercase letter
common.Password must contain at least one symbo: Password must contain at least one symbol and one number
common.Password should not more than 50 charact: Password should not more than 50 characters
common.Your forgot password link has expired, t: Your forgot password link has expired, try again.
common.It will automatically redirect login pag: It will automatically redirect login page after some time.
common.Sign In With Google or Facebook: Sign In With Google or Facebook
common.Are you sure want to delete this: Are you sure want to delete this
common.Name: Name
common.You can access customer personal details: You can access customer personal details and their activity history on the eCommerce portal including their viewed products and their ordered items. This provides valuable insights fortargeted marketing and understanding customer preferences and buying behaviour
common.You will be confirming Customer's order: You will be confirming Customer's order
common.You will be updating the Customer that t: You will be updating the Customer that the order is shipped
common.You will be updating the customer that t: You will be updating the customer that the order is getting delivered
common.AuditedBalanceSheetOfLast3years: Audited Balance Sheet of last 3 years
common.AtLeastOneNumberSymbolOrWhitespaceCharac: At least one number, symbol, or whitespace character
common.EnterTheCompanyNameAsRegisteredInGST/PAN: Enter The company/business name as registered in GST/PAN
common.CompleteYourCompanyDetails: Complete your company details to boost your credibility with customers. A comprehensive profile showcases your legitimacy, builds trust, and enhances your visibility in the marketplace.
common.EffortlesslyManageAndExpandYourOnlinePre: Effortlessly manage and expand your online presence. Add your social media handles in the vendor portal to connect with customers through multiple channels for further business growth.
common.CompleteYourTaxAndPayment: Complete your tax and payment details to facilitate seamless payouts. Your financial transparency and accuracy help streamline transactions and ensure timely disbursements.
common.CraftACompellingCompanyDescriptionToShow: Craft a compelling company description to showcase your brand's story and values. This personalized touch helps customers connect with your business, building trust and enhancing your brand's appeal.
common.AtWhichStockNumberPoint: At which stock number point, the Vendor has to get an intimation as it is out of stock. Example - 1.
common.MinimumQuantity: Minimum quantity that needs to be added to the cart for check out and placing order.
common.MaximumQuantity: Maximum quantity that needs to be added to the cart for check out and placing the order.
common.EnableBackOrders: Enable back orders for the ones for which the Customer has requested to get notified, when in stock.
common.ListOfTotalOrdersReceived: These are the list of total number of orders received so far on the eCommerce Portal.
common.ListOfOrdersReceivedToday: These are the list of orders received today and it will show only those orders that were received on today's date.
common.ListOfOrdersForWhichPaymentIsuccessful: These are the list of orders for which the payment process is successful.
common.WhenWritingYourProductDescription: When writing your product description, aim to provide a comprehensive overview of your item. Describe its features, benefits, and unique qualities in a way that resonates with potential buyers. Use clear and engaging language to captivate their interest and help them make informed purchasing decisions. Also, make sure to use a language that is easily readable and understandable.
common.IfSetThePriceWillReplace: If set, the price will replace the default price and the discount price provided will be shown to the Customers on the Storefront.
common.NoDiscountsOrSpecialPricesAddedYet: No Discounts or Special Prices Added Yet!
common.BoostYourSalesPotential: Boost your sales potential and revenue by offering discounts and special prices.Get started by creating irresistible offers.
common.ProvideTheStandardPrice: Provide the standard price for the product that is visible to the Customers on the Storefront by default.
common.Thisfeatureiscurrentlynotactiveforyou: You do not have access to this feature currently.
common.StartUploadingProductImages: Start uploading product images in the image library so that you can use whenever needed, both now and in the future
common.ChooseVideosFromYourSystem: Choose videos from your system, upload MP4 and WebM formats, or effortlessly embed YouTube videos. Showcase your products and engage customers effectively by providing a walkthrough experience.
common.StartUploadingProductVideos: Start uploading product videos that you can use whenever needed, both now and in the future. It ca either be an embedded YouTube Video or an MP4 format video in WebM format only.
common.ATemporaryPricingThatTakesPrecedence: A temporary pricing that takes precedence, striking out the default or discount price when given.
common.Start Adding exciting Coupons To Your Pr: Start Adding exciting Coupons To Your Products
common.DiscountPriceshouldbelessthanTotalPrice: Discount Price should be less than TotalPrice
common.SpecialPriceshouldbelessthanTotalPrice: Special Price should be less than TotalPrice
common.Lorem: Efficiently import bulk image data for products, categories, and attributes. Streamline your data entry process for images and save time with our user-friendly bulk import feature.
common.Themigrationhasbeencompletedsuccessfully: The migration has been completed successfully
common.YoucannowstartusingtheCRM: You can now start using the CRM

common.The migration has not been completed: The Migration has not been completed
common.Please check file you have uploaded: Please check file you have uploaded
common.CraftATitle: Craft a title that captivates, grabs attention, guides interest, communicates the purpose of the promotion, and drives engagement. E.g., Hot Summer Deals, Winder Discount Offers, etc.

quotation.AddQuotationStatusContent: Select 'Active' to inticate that the quotation is currently valid and under consideration. Choose 'Inactive' to mark the quotation as no longer valid or not in use.

shared.Doyouwanttomovethisordertoarchive: Do you want to move this order to archive?

payments.Name: Name

common.PriorityDescription: Set the importance level of the discount compared to default prices. Higher priority ensures the discount is applied first.
common.PriceDescription: Specify the discounted price to offer customers. This will replace the default price during the discount period.
common.StartDateDescription: Define the date when the discount promotion begins. The discount will become active from this date.
common.EndDateDescription: Set the date when the discount promotion ends. The discount will no longer be available after this date.
common.AssignDiscountDescription: Offer special discounts to drive sales and attract customers. Prioritize discounted prices over default pricing for effective promotions. Define the start and end dates to control the discount duration. Manage and schedule your discounts to maximize their impact.
common.Productcostmustnotbezero: Product cost must not be zero
common.DiscountpriceshouldbelessthanTotalprice: Discount price should be less than Total price
common.DiscountpriceshouldbelessthanVariantpric: Discount price should be less than Variant price
common.SpecialpriceshouldbelessthanTotalprice: Special price should be less than Total price
common.SpecialpriceshouldbelessthanVariantprice: Special price should be less than Variant price

product.EnteranSEOtag: Enter an SEO tag title, preferably between 0-140 characters
product.Entermetatag: Enter meta tag keywords for the product
product.metatagdescription: Type a meta tag description for the product, preferably between 160-170 characters
product.Doyouwanttoactivatethisprice: Do you want to activate this price?
product.AvailableCategoriesDescription: Choose from the list of available categories to map your product to categories. You may select one or more categories that best describe your product. Use the search bar to find specific categories. Use the '+' button to select categories.
product.SelectedCategoriesDescription: Selected categories will appear here after you choose them from the available list. Use the search bar to filter and manage selected categories.
product.SelectedCategoriesWarn: You can map multiple categories to your product for better classification and visibility. Ensure your product is easily discoverable by selecting relevant categories.

question.Add Questions and Answers to the product: Add Questions and Answers to the product to provide users with more detailed information.This feature helps address common queries and enhances the product listing.
question.Enter The question you wish to add about: Enter The question you wish to add about the product in this field. This helps clarify any uncertainties or provide additional details that may assist users in their decision-making process.
question.Provide your response to the question he: Provide your response to the question here. You can highlight one answer as the default, which will be prominently displayed, while other answers can be viewed by clicking to expand. This helps ensure users receive the most relevant and helpful information.

myProfile.CompanyDetailsDescription: Ensure your company information is accurate and up-to-date by editing your company details as needed. This section is crucial for maintaining clear and current records about your business operations, legal information, and contact details.
myProfile.FillinyourBankDetailshere: Fill in your Bank Details here
myProfile.Updateprofiledetails: Update profile details, change picture, email, or password. Save changes or cancel to start over
myProfile.Requestproductcategoriesthatyouwantedtos: Request product categories that you wanted to sell
myProfile.ChooseyouruniquebusinessdisplaynameinSpu: Choose your unique business display name in SpurtB2B
myProfile.Edityourcompanydetailsanytime: Edit your company details anytime to ensure they are up-to-date

dataExport.EfficientlyExportData: Efficiently export data for diverse Ecommerce Entities, including products, categories, orders, sales, payments and others.  Simplify your analysis and reporting with our comprehensive data export feature.

productImport.YourBulkProductUpdatepageisempty: Your Bulk Product Update page is empty

Validation.Please select a valid ZIP file: Please select a valid ZIP file

myShop.EmbeddedURLNote: Enter The URL of the video you want to embed. This should be a direct link to the video hosted on a platform like YouTube or Vimeo.
myShop.TypeofCertificationNote: Select the type of certificate from the dropdown menu to categorize the certificate appropriately (e.g., Quality Certification, Compliance Certification).
myShop.ReferenceNote: Enter The unique reference number assigned to the certificate for tracking and identification purposes.
myShop.NameNote: Provide the name of the certificate or its title to describe what the certificate is for.
myShop.IssuedbyNote: Specify the organization or authority that issued the certificate.
myShop.ValidateFromNote: Enter The start date for the certificate’s validity period. This indicates the time frame during which the certificate is valid.
myShop.ValidateToNote: Enter The end date for the certificate’s validity period. This indicates the time from which the certificate validity ends.
myShop.DocumentTypeNote: Select the Certificate type from the dropdown menu (e.g., Product Certificate, Environment Certificate, etc). Ensure compatibility with the required format for uploading.
myShop.UploadCertificateNotes: Upload the certificate file here. The file should be in PDF format only. Other formats will not be accepted.
myShop.UploadCertificateNote: Follow the guidelines for uploading documents, including file size and format restrictions.
myShop.UploadRelaventDoc: Upload the relevant certificate file here.
myShop.AddDocumentNote: Upload required documents to verify your company
myShop.BankAddressNote: Enter The address of the bank branch where your account is held.
myShop.BankNameNote: Enter The name of your bank where the account is held.
myShop.AccountNameNote: Provide the name of the individual or organization that holds the bank account.
myShop.BranchNote: Specify the branch of the bank where the account is maintained.
myShop.AccountNumberNote: Enter The unique account number assigned by the bank for your account.
myShop.IFSCNote: Provide the Indian Financial System Code (IFSC) for the bank branch. This code is used for electronic fund transfers.
myShop.BICNote: Enter The SWIFT/BIC code of the bank for international transactions.
myShop.SinceNote: Indicate the date when the bank account was opened.
myShop.NoVideos: No videos available. Upload videos to promote your products or provide additional information.
myShop.NoImages: No images available for your shop. Add images to showcase your products or store.
myShop.NoCertifications: No certifications available for your shop. Add new certifications to validate your shop’s compliance and credibility.
myShop.CompanyLogoDescription: Upload a logo image for your shop. The recommended file format is PNG or JPG, with a minimum size of 120 x 120 pixels. Click 'Upload Logo' to select a file from your computer. If needed, you can use 'Remove Logo' to delete the current logo.
myShop.EnterNameFirst: Enter your first name as it should appear on your profile. This is a required field for identification.
myShop.EnterNameLast: Provide your last name to complete your profile details. This helps in formal identification and communication.
myShop.GenderDescription: Select your gender from the available options. This information is used for personalizing your profile and communication.
myShop.DOB-Description: Enter your date of birth to complete your profile. This is used for age verification and personal identification.
myShop.PhoneNoDescription: Provide your mobile number for account verification and communication purposes. Ensure it is accurate for receiving notifications and updates.
myShop.RoleDescription: Specify your role within the company or organization. This helps in understanding your position and responsibilities.
myShop.EmailDescription: Your current email address used for logging into your account. Ensure it is valid and regularly checked for updates.
myShop.PasswordDescription: Enter your password as per the password policy to access your account. Keep it confidential and update it regularly for security.
myShop.UpdateEmailDescription: Update your email address if needed. Keeping your email current ensures you receive all relevant communications.
myShop.UpdatePasswordDescription: Regularly change your password to enhance account security. Ensure your new password is strong and secure.
myShop.BasicProfileDescription: Keep your profile information current by regularly updating your basic details. This ensures that your contact information and personal details are accurate and up-to-date, enhancing communication and account security.
myShop.ShopNameDescription: Your unique business display name in marketplace. A unique name that will be displayed in Store for your shop used for branding and visibility purposes.
myShop.VendorDetailsDescription: Provide a brief description of your shop, highlighting your offerings, unique selling points, and what makes your shop stand out. This helps customers understand more about your business.
myShop.CompanyRegisterDescription: Select the country where your company is officially registered. This information helps in verifying your business's legal standing and operations.
myShop.BuisnessNameDescription: Enter The official name of your business as registered in legal documents. This name will be used for all formal communications and business dealings.
myShop.BuisnessTypeDescription: Choose the type of business entity you operate. Options may include Wholesale, Retail, or other categories relevant to your industry.
myShop.BuisnessSegmentDescription: Specify the segment of your business, such as Corporate, Small Business, or others, to better categorize your company’s market focus.
myShop.BuisnessDomainDescription: Indicate the primary industry or domain in which your business operates. This helps in aligning your offerings with industry standards and customer expectations.
myShop.SellerLegalDescription: Provide the legal name of the seller or the individual representing the company. This is used for formal identification and contractual purposes.
myShop.UniqueNameDescription: Select a unique name that will be displayed on marketplace for branding and visibility purposes. Ensure it reflects your business identity clearly.
myShop.BuisnessAddressDescription: Enter your complete business address including all necessary details to ensure accurate delivery and correspondence.
myShop.PincodeDescription: Input the postal code for your business address to ensure precise location identification.
myShop.Address1Description: Provide the primary street address for your business location.
myShop.Address2Description: Enter additional address details if needed, such as suite or floor number.
myShop.AreaDescription: Specify the local area or district of your business location.
myShop.CityDescription: Enter The city where your business is located.
myShop.CountryDescription: Select the country where your business is situated.
myShop.StateDescription: Choose the state or province of your business location.
myShop.ContactDescription: Provide a phone number to contact for enqieres and support.
myShop.ShippingDescription: Select your preferred shipping method to align with your logistical needs.
myShop.TaxDescription: Enter your business’s tax identification number for tax reporting and legal compliance.
myShop.IdentifyNoDescription: Provide your business’s official identification number used for regulatory and operational purposes.
myShop.AccountDescription: Manage your account details and personal information to ensure everything is current and accurate.
myShop.LoginDescription: Secure your login credentials and settings to protect your account.
myShop.AddCapabilitiesDescription: Provide a detailed list of your shop's capabilities to showcase what you can offer to customers.
myShop.UploadCertificateDescription: Upload and display certificates that validate your shop's qualifications, compliance, or industry standards.
myShop.AddVideoUpload: Provide a title for the embedded video. This title will appear alongside the video to give context or describe its content.
myShop.CompanyDetailsInfo: Provide essential information about your company to complete the KYC process.
myShop.BankAccountInfo: Submit your bank account details to facilitate transactions and payments.
myShop.AddDocumentInfo: Upload required documents to verify your company and complete the KYC.

myShop.Secureyouraccount: Secure your account by changing your password regularly.
myShop.addressverified: Keep your email address verified to ensure you receive important updates and notifications. Regularly check and update your email if necessary.
myShop.AnOTPhas: An OTP has been sent to your new email address for verification. Please enter the OTP below to complete the verification process.

configuration.AvailableCategoryInfo: Click here to add additional variants for your product. Choose from existing options such as colours, sizes, or styles by selecting from the dropdown menus provided below.
configuration.VarientDetailsInfo: Provide detailed information for each variant of your product. Upload variant-specific images, select options such as colours or sizes, assign a unique SKU, set prices including default and discounted prices, manage inventory levels, and specify discount periods if applicable.
configuration.ChooseTemplateInfo: Choose the template type for importing your products. Select 'Standard' for a predefined format that simplifies bulk product uploads. Opt for 'Custom' to tailor the import template to specific requirements, accommodating unique product data structures or business needs.
configuration.NoDataAvailableForTheFilteredCriteria: No Data Available For The Filtered Criteria
configuration: No Data Available For The Filtered Criteria
configuration.Lorem: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed
configuration.Supported: Supported formats .csv,.xlsx; max file size 2 MB
configuration.drag: Or drag and drop it here
configuration.Toaddapayment: To add a payment method and start paying for API usage, go to the Billing overview page and select “Add payment details” to continue.
configuration.billing: You have not started a billing plan yet.
configuration.FieldsMapping: Efficiently map multiple product listings to various fields in bulk to streamline your product management process.
configuration.Info: Bulk product mapping allows sellers to efficiently upload multiple products,simultaneously by using predefined templates, streamlining inventory management. This feature typically includes mapping product attributes like titles, descriptions, prices, and images to ensure accurate listings.

Supplier.Numbers15 Only allowed: Phone No should be less than 15 character
Supplier.NameNote: Enter The full name of the contact person. This will help in identifying and addressing communications correctly.
Supplier.CompanyNote: Select a category for the contact to classify their role or type, such as Sales, Support, or Management. This helps in organizing and managing contacts more effectively.
Supplier.PositionNote: Specify the job title or role of the contact person within their organization. This provides context about their responsibilities and authority.
Supplier.StatusNotes: Set or update the current status of the contact. This could be active, inactive, or any other relevant status to track their engagement level.
Supplier.EmailNote: Enter The contact's email address for communication purposes. Ensure accuracy to facilitate effective correspondence.
Supplier.PhoneNote: Provide the contact's phone number for direct communication. Include the country code if necessary to ensure it is dialed correctly.
Supplier.DocumentTypeNote: Select the type of document from the dropdown menu to categorize the document appropriately (e.g., Certificate, Contract, etc.).
Supplier.UploadNote: Upload the relevant certificate file here. This could include compliance certificates, quality assurance documents, or other official credentials.
Supplier.UploadCertificateNote: Follow the guidelines for uploading documents, including file size and format restrictions.
Supplier.StatusNote: Set or update the current status of the supplier. This helps track the supplier's operational state, such as active, inactive, or under review.
Supplier.CategoryNote: Assign a category to the supplier to classify them based on their type or industry. This helps in organizing and managing suppliers more effectively.
Supplier.TagNote: Add tags to the supplier for additional classification or easy retrieval. Tags can include specific attributes or keywords related to the supplier’s services or products.
Supplier.SupplierNameLabel: Enter The name of the supplier or vendor providing products or services.
Supplier.TaxIdLabel: Enter The tax identification number (TIN) of the supplier for tax purposes.
Supplier.AddressLabel: Provide the complete postal address of the supplier, including street address, city, state, and postal code.
Supplier.CountryLabel: Select the country where the supplier is located from the dropdown list.
Supplier.WebsiteLabel: Optionally, enter the supplier's official website URL where buyers can find more information about their products or services.
Supplier.ContactCompanyLabel: Select or enter the company name.
Supplier.ContactPositionLabel: Specify the contact's role or title.
Supplier.ContactInformation: Provide contact information of the supplier
Supplier.RelevantNotes: Provide relevant notes about the supplier.
Supplier.UploadDocuments: Upload important documents related to the supplier, such as contracts or certifications.
Supplier.AddLink: Add Name & URLs to external resources or supplier profiles that might be useful for reference.
Supplier.Phone number should only contain up to 1: Phone number should only contain up to 15 digits
Supplier.Name: Name

perSonalizedSettings.chooseLanguageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface and content. This will localize the platform to your chosen language.
perSonalizedSettings.timeZoneDescription: Specify your time zone to ensure that all date and time-related information is accurate according to your local time.
perSonalizedSettings.dateFormatDescription: Choose your preferred format for displaying dates (e.g., MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YYYY). This will standardize how dates appear throughout the platform.
perSonalizedSettings.timeFormatDescription: Select your preferred format for displaying time (e.g., 12-hour or 24-hour clock). This will adjust how times are shown on the platform.

pricing.quantityContent: Enter The quantity of each product that this price list applies to.
pricing.UnitContent: Specify the unit of measurement for the quantity, such as pieces, boxes, or liters.
pricing.PriceContent: Set the price for each product within this price list.
pricing.CustomerNameContent: Create a new customer group by entering the group name. This group will then be used to apply specific pricing or promotions to its members.
pricing.Group NameContent: Select and add individual customers to the chosen group. This will apply the assigned pricing or promotions to the selected customers within this group.
pricing.GENERALContent: Enter The basic details for the price list, including the name and description to identify and differentiate it.
pricing.PriceListContent: Specify a unique name for the price list to easily reference and manage it within your system. You can activate it, set it as the default, or disable it using the toggle
pricing.Schedulescontent: Define the schedules for the price list, including start date for activation and end date for deactivation, to control its validity period and ensure accurate pricing application.
pricing.chooseProductDesContent: Select the specific products to include in the price list
pricing.SearchProductContent: Use the keyword search bar to quickly find specific products for including in price list
pricing.ContentCUstomer: Create and manage customer groups, then assign the price list to these groups to apply the pricing specifically to the customers within them
pricing.productContent: Select the specific products to include in the price list.

CommonContent.dateProduct: Enter The date of your product. It should accurately reflect the product's key features and benefits.
CommonContent.inventory: Available Stock of your product. When variants are added, the system shall let specify variant level stock that is currently available.
CommonContent.VariantDiscount: Base cost of purchasing the product exclusive of Tax and other discounts. When variants are added, the system shall let specify variant level base price for the individual SKU.
CommonContent.VariantSpecial: Base cost of purchasing the product exclusive of Tax and other special discounts. When variants are added, the system shall let specify variant level base price for the individual SKU.
CommonContent.emailNumber: To get started, please fill out your profile with essential details. This will help you stand out and attract more customers.
CommonContent.onboardingcontent: Finish the documentation process to unlock all features and start selling your products effectively.
CommonContent.shopcontent: Fill details about your shop so buyers can know more about your company, brand and the range of products that you sell. This feature is available after the onboarding / KYC is completely verified by admin.
CommonContent.YourSellerProfile: Your Seller Profile with essential contact info has been successfully verified. Carefully review the other section for your action items, if any.
CommonContent.variantDelete: Cannot modify variations of this products since there one or more orders available !! This restriction is to avoid overwriting of variant SKUs !!
CommonContent.chooseModule: Choose the appropriate module to configure specific settings.

PricingChanges.Quantity cannot exceed the actual produc: Quantity cannot exceed the actual product entity

TermsAndCondition.Published: Published February 17th, 2024. Effective as of February 17th, 2024.
TermsAndCondition.GeneralTerms: These General Terms of Use replace and supersede all prior versions.
TermsAndCondition.YourAgreementwithSpurtcommerce: Terms and Conditions for Seller Panel
TermsAndCondition.WelcomeSpurtcommerceSeller: Welcome to the Marketplace Seller Panel! These Terms and Conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our platform. By accessing or using the Spurtcommerce, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.
TermsAndCondition.ByCreatingASellerAccount: By creating a seller account, you confirm that all the information provided is accurate, up-to-date, and truthful. The Marketplace reserves the right to terminate or suspend accounts that provide false information or engage in fraudulent activities.
TermsAndCondition.YouAreResponsibleForMaintaining: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. The Seller Panel cannot be held liable for any unauthorized access or use of your account.
TermsAndCondition.YouNayNotCreateMultipleSellerAccounts: You may not create multiple seller accounts unless authorized by the Seller Panel. Sellers found to be creating fake or multiple accounts may have their access revoked.

BulkUpdate.ChooseMultipleProducts: Choose multiple products from the list and select 'Active' to display them to customers or 'Inactive' to hide them, facilitating effective product management.
BulkUpdate.SelectMultipleCustomer: Select multiple customer accounts from the list and choose 'Active' to enable them for online purchases, or 'Inactive' to disable access for all selected accounts at once.
BulkUpdate.SelectAndActivateMultiple: Select and Activate multiple selected customer groups from the list to make them available for promotions or pricing strategies; select 'Inactive' to hide these groups in bulk.
BulkUpdate.SelectMultipleratingsandreviews: Select Multiple ratings and reviews entries from the list and easily update the status of selected ratings and reviews by selecting 'Active' to display them, or 'Inactive' to hide them from view for all chosen items simultaneously.
BulkUpdate.ManageMultipleCoupons: Manage multiple coupons at once by selecting from the list and activate them at once to allow usage for all selected coupons, or select inactivate to disable them collectively.
BulkUpdate.SelectMultipleSuppliers: Select multiple suppliers from the list and set them to 'Active' to include them in your listings, or 'Inactive' to remove them from visibility in bulk.
BulkUpdate.QuicklyActivateOrDeactivate: Quickly activate or deactivate multiple supplier contacts by selecting multiple contacts from the list at once.

newReq.tagcontent: Create Tags to categorize content effectively. Use the find option to quickly find and add relevant tags, enhancing organization and searchability across your platform.
newReq.sellercontentimage: If the Seller is registered, a link to reset the password is sent to the input email address.
newReq.error: Invalid Email! The email you have entered is not registered with us
newReq.Enter your Registered email ID below. We: Enter your Registered Email ID below. We will sent the link to reset your password
newReq.localization: Manage product details in multiple languages by providing localized titles and descriptions in different languages. Ensure your products are accessible and understandable for customers across different regions, enhancing their shopping experience in their preferred language.
newReq.Personalized pricing has been applied to: Personalized pricing has been applied to this order!
newReq.Select: Select a 'status' from the drop down to define the status of the order.
newReq.ViewTimeline: View Timeline for status change of this order

newContent.addCustomerGroupContent: Select from the available customer groups
newContent.skuContent: Provide product SKU specific to your listing for this common product
newContent.priceContent: Provide your selling price for this common product
newContent.quantityContent: Provide inventory specific to your selling ability for this common product
newContent.bulkPriceContent: Select option to Activate or Inactivate pricing options in bulk for the selected entries
newContent.previewContent: Map multiple product listings to various fields such as SKU, attributes, and categories in bulk, allowing for efficient organization and streamlined management of product data.
